sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { FaArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/fa'; import './EmployeeProfile.css'; const EmployeeProfile = ({ employee, onBack }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('personal'); const [detailedEmployee, setDetailedEmployee] = useState(null); const [loading, setLoading] = useState(true); const [error, setError] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { const fetchDetailedProfile = async () => { if (!employee || !employee.empId) return; try { setLoading(true); const token = localStorage.getItem('token'); if (!token) { throw new Error('No authentication token found'); } const response = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/hr/profile-detailed/${employee.empId}`, { method: 'GET', headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token}` } }); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Failed to fetch employee details'); } const data = await response.json(); if (data.operation === 'success') { setDetailedEmployee(data.data); } else { throw new Error(data.message || 'Failed to load employee details'); } } catch (err) { console.error('Error fetching detailed profile:', err); setError(err.message); } finally { setLoading(false); } }; fetchDetailedProfile(); }, [employee]); if (!employee) { return (

Employee Not Found

); } if (loading) { return (
Loading employee details...
); } if (error) { return (

Error Loading Profile

{error}

); } // Use detailedEmployee data when available, fallback to basic employee data const empData = detailedEmployee || employee; const renderPersonalInfo = () => (

Basic Information

Employee ID {empData.EmpID || employee.empId}
Full Name {empData.FirstName || employee.name}
Father Name {empData.FatherName || 'N/A'}
Date of Birth {empData.DOB || 'N/A'}
Gender {empData.GenderID || 'N/A'}
Blood Group {empData.BloodGroupID || 'N/A'}

Contact Information

Office Email {empData.OfficeEmail || employee.email}
Personal Email {empData.PersonalEmail || 'N/A'}
Office Mobile {empData.OfficeMobile || employee.mobile}
Home Phone {empData.HomePhone || 'N/A'}

Address

Street {empData.HAStreet || 'N/A'}
Street No {empData.HAStreetNo || 'N/A'}
Block {empData.HABlock || 'N/A'}
City {empData.HACity || 'N/A'}
); // Employment Info const renderEmploymentInfo = () => (

Service Information

Served: {empData.SinceDate || 'N/A'}
Joining Date: {empData.JoiningDate || 'N/A'}
Confirmation Date: {empData.ConfirmationDate || 'N/A'}
Resignation Date: {empData.ResignDate || 'N/A'}
Contract Type: {empData.EmployeeContractType || 'N/A'}

Position Information

Designation: {empData.DesignationName || employee.designation}
Position: {empData.PositionName || employee.grade}
Department: {empData.DepartmentName || employee.department}
Location: {empData.LocationName || employee.zone}
Branch: {empData.BranchName || employee.branch}

Reporting Structure

Report To: {empData.ReportToID || employee.reportTo}
Manager: {empData.Manager || 'N/A'}
); // Financial Info const renderFinancialInfo = () => (

Salary Information

Basic Salary: {empData.BasicSalary || 'N/A'}
Gross Salary: {empData.GrossSalary || 'N/A'}
Fixed Salary: {empData.FixedSalary || 'N/A'}
Allowed Advance: {empData.AllowedAdvance || 'N/A'}
Payment Mode: {empData.PaymentMode || 'N/A'}

Bank Information

Bank Name: {empData.BankName || 'N/A'}
Account Title: {empData.AccountTitle || 'N/A'}
Account Type: {empData.AccountType || 'N/A'}
Account Number: {empData.AccountNo || 'N/A'}

Additional Codes

Payroll Name: {empData.PayrollName || 'N/A'}
SBO Emp Code: {empData.SBOEmpCode || 'N/A'}
User Code: {empData.UserCode || 'N/A'}
); // Documents Info const renderDocumentsInfo = () => (

Identification Documents

ID Number: {empData.IDNo || 'N/A'}
Passport Number: {empData.PassportNo || 'N/A'}
Passport Expiry: {empData.PassportExpiryDate || 'N/A'}
Income Tax No: {empData.IncomeTaxNo || 'N/A'}
EOBI Number: {empData.EOBINo || 'N/A'}
Iqama Professional: {empData.IqamaProfessional || 'N/A'}

Additional Information

Org Hierarchy ID: {empData.OrgHierarchyId || 'N/A'}
); return (
{/* Header Section */}
{empData.ImgPath ? ( ) : (
{(empData.FirstName || employee.name) ? (empData.FirstName || employee.name).charAt(0).toUpperCase() : '?'}
)}

{empData.FirstName || employee.name}

{empData.Status || employee.status}

{empData.DesignationName || employee.designation}

{empData.DepartmentName || employee.department} {empData.PayrollName || employee.division}

SERVED [{empData.SinceDate || 'Year - Month - Days: '}]

{/* Tabs Navigation */}
{/* Tab Content */}
{activeTab === 'personal' && renderPersonalInfo()} {activeTab === 'employment' && renderEmploymentInfo()} {activeTab === 'financial' && renderFinancialInfo()} {activeTab === 'documents' && renderDocumentsInfo()}
); }; export default EmployeeProfile;
